pepc-b/face.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !
00002 !   FACE
00003 !
00004 !  Function to set up bounded geometry targets in conjunction with 
00005 !  PLASMA_START. 
00006 !  M. Hammes, U. Wuppertal
00007 !
00008 !  $Revision: 448 $
00009 !
00010 ! Generalised description of convex faces described 
00011 ! by a function f(x, y, z) = 0. 
00012 ! Saves f(r) in c_status
00013 ! and means c_status > 0.: particle is out,
00014 ! c_status < 0.: particle is in.
00015 
00016 subroutine face(r, c_status, face_nr, &
00017     target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00018 
00019     implicit none 
00020 
00021     real*8, intent(in), dimension(1:3)      :: r
00022     real*8, intent(out)                     :: c_status
00023     integer, intent(in)                     :: face_nr
00024     integer, intent(in)                     :: target_geometry
00025     real, intent(in) :: x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere
00026     real, intent(in) :: plasma_centre(3)
00027 
00028     ! vectors and other values for the slab
00029     real*8, dimension(1:3)          :: r_diff
00030     real*8, dimension(1:3)            :: normal_vector, offset_vector
00031     real*8                            :: gamma
00032 
00033     ! matrix for the ellipsoid
00034     real, dimension(1:3, 1:3)       :: A
00035 
00036     select case (target_geometry)
00037     case (0) ! slab
00038         select case (face_nr)
00039         case(1) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00040             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., +1. /)
00041             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., -z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00042         case(2) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00043             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., -1./)
00044             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., +z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00045         case(3) ! x-z-plane, negative y
00046             normal_vector = (/ 0., +1., 0. /)
00047             offset_vector = (/ 0., -y_plasma/2., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00048         case(4) ! x-z-plane, positive y
00049             normal_vector = (/ 0., -1., 0. /)
00050             offset_vector = (/ 0., +y_plasma/2., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00051         case(5) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00052             normal_vector = (/ +1., 0., 0. /)
00053             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00054         case(6) ! y-z-plane, positive x
00055             normal_vector = (/ -1., 0., 0. /)
00056             offset_vector = (/ +x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00057         end select
00058 
00059         c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00060 
00061     case(1) ! sphere
00062         r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00063         c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00064 
00065     case(11) ! hollow sphere
00066         r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00067         select case (face_nr)
00068         case(1) ! outer_sphere
00069             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00070         case(2) ! inner_sphere
00071             c_status = (r_sphere - x_plasma)**2 - dot_product(r_diff, r_diff)
00072         end select
00073 
00074     case(2) ! disc
00075         select case (face_nr)
00076         case(1) ! the tube in x-direction
00077             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00078             c_status = r_diff(2)**2 + r_diff(3)**2 - r_sphere**2
00079         case(2) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00080             normal_vector = (/ +1., 0., 0. /)
00081             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00082             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00083         case(3) ! y-z-plane, positive x
00084             normal_vector = (/ -1., 0., 0. /)
00085             offset_vector = (/ +x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00086             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00087         end select
00088 
00089     case(12)  ! hollow disc/tube, thickness z_plasma
00090         select case (face_nr)
00091         case(1) ! the tube in x-direction
00092             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00093             c_status = r_diff(2)**2 + r_diff(3)**2 - r_sphere**2
00094         case(2) ! the inner tube in z-direction
00095             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00096             c_status =  (r_sphere-z_plasma)**2 - (r_diff(2)**2 + r_diff(3)**2)
00097         case(3) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00098             normal_vector = (/ +1., 0., 0. /)
00099             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00100             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00101         case(4) ! y-z-plane, positive x
00102             normal_vector = (/ -1., 0., 0. /)
00103             offset_vector = (/ +x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00104             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00105         end select
00106 
00107     case(3)  ! wire
00108         select case (face_nr)
00109         case(1) ! the tube in z-direction
00110             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00111             c_status = r_diff(1)**2 + r_diff(2)**2 - r_sphere**2
00112         case(2) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00113             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., +1. /)
00114             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., -z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00115             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00116         case(3) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00117             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., -1. /)
00118             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., +z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00119             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00120         end select
00121 
00122     case(13)  ! hollow wire
00123         select case (face_nr)
00124         case(1) ! the tube in z-direction
00125             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00126             c_status = r_diff(1)**2 + r_diff(2)**2 - r_sphere**2
00127         case(2) ! the inner tube in z-direction
00128             r_diff = r - plasma_centre
00129             c_status =  (r_sphere-x_plasma)**2 - (r_diff(1)**2 + r_diff(2)**2)
00130         case(3) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00131             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., +1. /)
00132             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., -z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00133             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00134         case(4) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00135             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., -1. /)
00136             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., +z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00137             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00138         end select
00139 
00140     case(4) ! ellipsoid
00141         A = reshape((/ 1./x_plasma, 0., 0., 0., 1./y_plasma, 0., 0., 0., 1./z_plasma /), (/3, 3/))
00142         r_diff = matmul(A, r - plasma_centre)
00143         c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00144 
00145     case(5) ! prism in x-y plane
00146         gamma = atan(y_plasma / (2 * x_plasma))
00147         select case (face_nr)
00148         case(1) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00149             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., -1. /)
00150             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., +z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00151         case(2) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00152             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., +1. /)
00153             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., -z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00154         case(3) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00155             normal_vector = (/ +1., 0., 0. /)
00156             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00157         case(4) ! negative y
00158             normal_vector = (/ -sin(gamma), +cos(gamma), 0.d0 /)
00159             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., -y_plasma/2., 0.0 /) + plasma_centre
00160         case(5) ! positive y
00161             normal_vector = (/ -sin(gamma), -cos(gamma), 0.d0 /)
00162             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., +y_plasma/2.,0. /) + plasma_centre
00163         end select
00164         c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00165 
00166 
00167     case(6) ! hemisphere: flat side facing laser
00168         select case (face_nr)
00169         case(1) ! hemisphere
00170             r_diff = r + (/ r_sphere/2., 0., 0. /) - plasma_centre
00171             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00172         case(2) ! y-z-plane
00173             normal_vector = (/ +1., 0., 0. /)
00174             offset_vector = (/ -r_sphere/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00175             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00176         end select
00177 
00178     case(16) ! hollow hemisphere
00179         select case (face_nr)
00180         case(1) ! outer hemisphere
00181             r_diff = r + (/ r_sphere/2., 0., 0. /) - plasma_centre
00182             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00183         case(2) ! inner hemisphere
00184             r_diff = r + (/ r_sphere/2., 0., 0. /) - plasma_centre
00185             c_status = (r_sphere - x_plasma)**2 - dot_product(r_diff, r_diff)
00186         case(3) ! y-z-plane
00187             normal_vector = (/ 1., 0., 0. /)
00188             offset_vector = (/-r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00189             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00190         end select
00191 
00192     case(26) ! flipped hemisphere: curved side facing laser
00193         select case (face_nr)
00194         case(1) ! hemisphere
00195             r_diff = r - (/ r_sphere/2., 0., 0. /) - plasma_centre
00196             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00197         case(2) ! y-z-plane
00198             normal_vector = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00199             offset_vector = (/ +r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00200             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00201         end select
00202 
00203 
00204     case(36) ! flipped hollow hemisphere: curved surface facing laser
00205         select case (face_nr)
00206         case(1) ! outer hemisphere
00207             r_diff = r - (/r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) - plasma_centre
00208             c_status = dot_product(r_diff, r_diff) - r_sphere**2
00209         case(2) ! inner hemisphere
00210             r_diff = r - (/r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) - plasma_centre
00211             c_status = (r_sphere - x_plasma)**2 - dot_product(r_diff, r_diff)
00212         case(3) ! y-z-plane
00213             normal_vector = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00214             offset_vector = (/+r_sphere/2., 0., 0./) + plasma_centre
00215             c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00216         end select
00217 
00218     case default  ! revert to slab
00219         select case (face_nr)
00220         case(1) ! x-y-plane, negative z
00221             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., +1. /)
00222             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., -z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00223         case(2) ! x-y-plane, positive z
00224             normal_vector = (/ 0., 0., -1./)
00225             offset_vector = (/ 0., 0., +z_plasma/2. /) + plasma_centre
00226         case(3) ! x-z-plane, negative y
00227             normal_vector = (/ 0., +1., 0./)
00228             offset_vector = (/ 0., -y_plasma/2., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00229         case(4) ! x-z-plane, positive y
00230             normal_vector = (/ 0., -1., 0./)
00231             offset_vector = (/ 0., +y_plasma/2., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00232         case(5) ! y-z-plane, negative x
00233             normal_vector = (/ +1., 0., 0. /)
00234             offset_vector = (/ -x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00235         case(6) ! y-z-plane, positive x
00236             normal_vector = (/ -1., 0., 0. /)
00237             offset_vector = (/ +x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /) + plasma_centre
00238         end select
00239 
00240         c_status = dot_product(normal_vector, offset_vector - r)
00241 
00242     end select
00243 
00244 end subroutine face
